definition: not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: But Moore's hair was not always done up.
sentences.chinese: 然而穆爾的頭髮並不總是梳得一絲不苟的。

sentences.english: However, Badigin is very precise and punctilious person.
sentences.chinese: 巴季金是一個非常精確和一絲不苟的人。

sentences.english: Barristers - always such sticklers for detail.
sentences.chinese: 律師們總是對細節一絲不苟。

sentences.english: Hanks so scrupulously, heroically mimes the wasting wought by the disease.
sentences.chinese: 漢克斯咬緊牙關，一絲不苟地模仿艾滋病造成的虛弱。

sentences.english: However, Badigin is very precise and punctilious person. Just seven kills.
sentences.chinese: 巴季金是一個非常精確和一絲不苟的人。

sentences.english: Billy is punctilious in the performance of his duties.
sentences.chinese: 畢利執行任務總是一絲不苟的。

sentences.english: He wiped his hands on his fatigue trousers with a slow thorough motion .
sentences.chinese: 他慢騰騰一絲不苟地把手在破褲子上擦了幾擦。

sentences.english: Zunzhangshouji implement a standard strict in demands, not bad.
sentences.chinese: 遵章守紀一絲不苟，落實標準一點不差。

sentences.english: Zazen is meticulous work and details are important.
sentences.chinese: 坐禪需要一絲不苟，細節是關鍵。

sentences.english: There are many notes which indicate how scrupulous Jane is about facts.
sentences.chinese: 有許多短信可以表明，簡對事實是一絲不苟的。

sentences.english: Both readers commend Knutson for his scrupulous attention to detail.
sentences.chinese: 兩位讀者都稱讚克努森對細節一絲不苟。

sentences.english: In the production stage, Li Ying controlled the process by every step meticulously.
sentences.chinese: 在產品製作階段，李影更加做到一絲不苟。

sentences.english: Fairness is a broader concept than accuracy or thoroughness.
sentences.chinese: 公正是一個比準確和一絲不苟更廣泛的概念。

sentences.english: The accuracy and meticulousness of the performing artist are always overlooked by academic community.
sentences.chinese: 表演藝術家的準確性和一絲不苟也時常被學術界忽視。

sentences.english: My supervisor appraises me as conscientious and responsible in work.
sentences.chinese: 導師對我的工作的評價是一絲不苟，認真負責。

sentences.english: For decades, he has been cautious and conscientious towards work.
sentences.chinese: 幾十年來，他對工作一直兢兢業業，一絲不苟。

definition: making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
perfect (idiom); perfection/the best of all possible worlds/as good as it gets
to concentrate one's attention completely (idiom)/with rapt attention
lit. an easy drive on a familiar path (idiom); fig. experience makes progress easy/a task that is so familiar one can do it with one's hand tied behind one's back
lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job/entirely in one's element/going smoothly and easily
lit. to spit out one's heart and spill blood (idiom)/to work one's heart out/blood, sweat and tears
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
